Text: I just have to own a MAC to have a clean copy of CS5. Hope this works

Download the Host file patcher at http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7064808/Adobe_Master_Collection_CS5_Host_File_Patcher[ASkyNinja] and run it after installing, but before running the activator. If you have already ran the activator, run this, and then run the activator again...

Installed the software and ran the patch- I put the amitlib.dll file in every program directory. Still can't run Indesign, tried running the patch again and then running activation again- when I run Indesign it says software is not properly licensed and shuts down--- Also looks like Acrobat didn't install -it is nowhere to be found. Any suggestions? Please advise.
